snippet.title: New Orleans Brown-Rice Calas Recipe
snippet.description: * New Orleans Brown-Rice Calas Recipe Calas—or rice fritters—are classic New Orleans street food. This holiday time-saving recipe allows you to make the batter day before to finish quickly on the day of your gathering. Our healthier version uses brown rice, whole-wheat and almond flours,...

snippet.title: Recipe of the Week: Mexican Rice
snippet.description: * Recipe of the Week: Mexican Rice This recipe is from the California Nutrition Network Harvest of the Month program, delivering nutrition education, messages and recipe to California children, parents and teachers all over the State. snippet.title: Recipe of the Week: Wild Rice & Orange Salad
snippet.description: * Recipe of the Week: Wild Rice & Orange Salad I often make this rice salad for parties as it is always a hit and I never have to throw any away. The candied pecans and mandarin oranges lend some sweetness making it more appealing to the 18 and under crowd. It is a nice change from the same-o sam...

snippet.title: Brown Rice Pilaf Dinner Recipe
snippet.description: * Brown Rice Pilaf Dinner Recipe Makes 8 servings Ingredients Vegetable cooking spray 1 onion, chopped 1 teaspoon minced garlic 1 cup long grain brown rice 1 cup dry white wine 2½ cups vegetable stock, heated Instructions Preheat oven to 350 degrees. snippet.title: Italian Beef and Rice Stuffed Peppers Recipe
